name: TheGameZone
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the game zone
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Game Zone features an ever growing collection of games to keep the whole family entertained. Games from different categories are available including puzzles, sports games, skill games and luck games.

Current games are:

- 2048
- Blackjack
- Blocks
- Bubble Shoot
- Fruit Merge
- Hoops
- MazeMaster
- Pimple Popping
- Sudoku
- Toweslice

Various sound effects courtesy of Zapsplat.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
